price: “Taabotawwan gabbarra; ishee [gabbaruu] irras warra turu taane” jedhan.
arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū naʿbudu aṣnāman fanaẓallu lahā ʿākifīna
